name: Operation Death Tower
description:
Made for MiniJam 100 - Overload

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

C - Crouch

You have been tasked with destroying a tower located in the centre of an abandoned military encampment.

Be warned, the tower contains multiple AI-controlled turrets which will attack all entities within the encampment.

You must search for 10 power cells scattered around the encampment, taking them and inserting them into the generator underneath the tower.

Once all of the power cells have been inserted, the generator will become overloaded leading to rapid disassembly of the tower.

Good luck!
